issue.title: [C++] Use std::to_chars instead of std::to_string
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18350](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18350). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`std::to_chars` is locale-independent unlike `std::to_string`; it may also be faster in some cases.
